topics.body:
So get this.
[spoiler]A lady uncovers an evil record that kills anyone who listens to it. The record possesses two dudes and gets them to play it at a college campus. So how does John plan to rectify the situation? He charges into the radio room wearing headphones that are playing "Anarchy in the UK":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pOe9PJrbo0s at full volume. Constantine kicks ass![/spoiler]
